Original meaning 本义: Meaning delicate and graceful, same as 嫋.

Usage example 用法举例: 嬝娜 niǎo nuó (willowy)

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 嬝 from female 女 nǚ and phonetic curling-upwards (袅)裊 niǎo C428 裊<嫋嬝褭> simp 袅.

嬝字的基本解释

嬝
niǎo
同“袅”。

嬝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［niǎo］
［《廣韻》奴鳥切，上篠，泥。］
亦作“嬝1”。
(1)纤长柔美貌。
(2)摇曳；扭动。
(3)飘舞。
(4)悠扬婉转。参见“嫋嫋”。

嬝字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嬝； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页272第22
同嫋。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［niǎo］
["Guangyun" Slave bird cut, upper xiao, mud. ]
Also known as "碅1".
(1) Slender, soft and beautiful appearance.
(2) Swaying; twisting.
(3) Fluttering.
(4) Melodious and tactful. See "Curl".
delicate

The same curl.
